SELECT r.reception_id reception_id, p.patient_id patient_id, p.patient_name patient_name,
r.systolic systolic, r.diastolic diastolic, r.blood_sugar blood_sugar, r.height height, r.weight weight, r.bmi bmi, r.treatment_reason treatment_reason FROM Reception r inner join Patient p on r.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE reception_id = #{reception_id}

SELECT d.disease_id disease_id, d.disease_code disease_code, d.disease_name disease_name FROM Underlying u inner join Disease d on u.disease_id = d.disease_id WHERE u.patient_id = #{patient_id} ORDER BY d.disease_code
SELECT d.drug_id drug_id, d.drug_code drug_code, d.drug_name drug_name FROM Drug_Taking dt inner join Drug d on dt.drug_id = d.drug_id WHERE dt.patient_id = #{patient_id} ORDER BY d.drug_code

disease_code LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')
disease_name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')

SELECT drug_id, drug_code, drug_name FROM Drug WHERE
drug_code LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')
drug_name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')

mapper.update: UPDATE Clinic set symptom = #{symptom}, treatment = #{treatment}, clinic_request = #{clinic_request}, updator = #{updator} WHERE reception_id = #{reception_id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.reception_id reception_id, p.patient_name patient_name, e.employee_name employee_name, r.created_at created_at FROM Reception r INNER JOIN Patient p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id INNER JOIN Employee e ON r.doctor = e.employ_id WHERE r.patient_id = #{patient_id} AND r.state = "수납완료"

SELECT Disease.disease_id disease_id, Disease.disease_code disease_code, Disease.disease_name disease_name, r.reception_id reception_id FROM Diagnosis d INNER JOIN Reception r ON d.reception_id = r.reception_id INNER JOIN Disease ON d.disease_id = Disease.disease_id WHERE d.reception_id = #{reception_id}

SELECT d.drug_id, d.drug_code, d.drug_name, r.reception_id reception_id FROM Prescription p INNER JOIN Reception r ON p.reception_id = r.reception_id INNER JOIN Drug d ON p.drug_id = d.drug_id WHERE p.reception_id = #{reception_id}

SELECT r.reception_id reception_id, p.patient_name patient_name, e.employee_name employee_name, r.created_at created_at FROM Patient p INNER JOIN Reception r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id INNER JOIN Employee e ON r.doctor = e.employ_id
WHERE reception_id = #{keyword} WHERE p.patient_name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%')
AND r.created_at BETWEEN #{start} AND DATE_ADD(#{end}, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND r.state = "수납완료"

SELECT r.reception_id reception_id, c.created_at created_at, p.patient_name patient_name, p.front_registration_number front_registration_number, e.employee_name employee_name, r.systolic systolic, r.diastolic diastolic, r.blood_sugar blood_sugar, r.height height, r.weight weight, r.bmi bmi, c.symptom symptom, c.treatment treatment, c.clinic_request clinic_request FROM Reception r INNER JOIN Employee e ON r.doctor = e.employ_id INNER JOIN Clinic c ON r.reception_id = c.reception_id INNER JOIN Patient p ON r.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE r.reception_id = #{reception_id}
